SELECT p.id, p.tenant_id, p.client_final_id, p.invoice_id, p.numero_proforma, p.date_proforma, p.date_validite, p.montant_ht, p.montant_ttc, p.tva_taux, p.description, p.mode_paiement, p.statut, p.lien_pdf, p.created_at, p.updated_at, cf.nom as client_nom, cf.prenom as client_prenom, cf.email as client_email, cf.telephone as client_telephone, cf.raison_sociale as client_raison_sociale FROM proformas p LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON p.client_final_id = cf.id WHERE p.tenant_id = $1 AND p.numero_proforma IS NOT NULL AND p.date_proforma IS NOT NULL AND ($2 IS NULL OR p.statut = $2) AND ($3 IS NULL OR p.client_final_id = $3) ORDER BY p.date_proforma DESC LIMIT $4 OFFSET $5

parameters.jsCode:
const items = $('06. List Query').all().map(item => item.json).filter(p => p.id);
const countResult = $('05. Count Query').first().json;
const parser = $('02. Parser').first().json;
const total = parseInt(countResult.total) || 0;
const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / parser.limit) || 1;

const proformas = items.map(p => ({
  id: p.id,
  tenant_id: p.tenant_id,
  client_final_id: p.client_final_id,
  invoice_id: p.invoice_id,
  invoiceId: p.invoice_id,
  numero_proforma: p.numero_proforma,
  numeroProforma: p.numero_proforma,
  date_proforma: p.date_proforma,
  dateProforma: p.date_proforma,
  date_validite: p.date_validite,
  dateValidite: p.date_validite,
  montant_ht: p.montant_ht,
  montantHt: p.montant_ht,
  montant_ttc: p.montant_ttc,
  montantTtc: p.montant_ttc,
  tva_taux: p.tva_taux,
  tvaTaux: p.tva_taux,
  description: p.description,
  mode_paiement: p.mode_paiement,
  modePaiement: p.mode_paiement,
  statut: p.statut,
  lien_pdf: p.lien_pdf,
  lienPdf: p.lien_pdf,
  created_at: p.created_at,
  createdAt: p.created_at,
  updated_at: p.updated_at,
  updatedAt: p.updated_at,
  clientFinal: p.client_final_id ? {
    id: p.client_final_id,
    nom: p.client_nom || null,
    prenom: p.client_prenom || null,
    email: p.client_email || null,
    telephone: p.client_telephone || null,
    raisonSociale: p.client_raison_sociale || null
  } : null
}));

return [{ json: {
  proformas,
  count: proformas.length,
  total,
  page: parser.page,
  limit: parser.limit,
  totalPages
}}];
